faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about giving and security

security.question: Is online giving secure?
security.answer: Yes, all online transactions are processed through bank-level encryption and security. Tithely is PCI compliant and uses the same security standards as major financial institutions. Your personal and financial information is never stored on our servers.

receipts.question: Will I receive a receipt for tax purposes?
receipts.answer: Yes, you will automatically receive email receipts for all online donations. At the end of the year, you'll receive a comprehensive giving statement for tax deduction purposes. For Zelle and Cash App donations, please contact our office for manual receipt processing.

recurring.question: Can I set up recurring donations?
recurring.answer: Absolutely! Through Tithely, you can set up weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly recurring donations. You can modify or cancel recurring gifts at any time through your Tithely account or by contacting our office.

contact.question: Who can I contact with questions about giving?
contact.answer: For any questions about giving, receipts, or technical issues, please contact our church office at (555) 123-4567 or email finance@fmcbethlehem.org. We're here to help make your giving experience as smooth as possible.

footer.title: Thank You for Your Generosity
footer.message: Your faithful giving enables us to serve our community, support missions, and maintain our facilities. Every gift, no matter the size, makes a difference in advancing God's kingdom.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To glorify God by making disciples who love Jesus, love each other, and love our community through worship, fellowship, and service.

love.title: Love
love.description: We love God with all our heart, soul, mind, and strength, and love our neighbors as ourselves.

community.title: Community
community.description: We believe in the power of authentic relationships and genuine fellowship in Christ.

service.title: Service
service.description: We are called to serve others with humility, compassion, and the love of Christ.

truth.title: Truth
truth.description: We are committed to the truth of God's Word and living according to His principles.

history.title: Our Story
history.founding: FMCB was founded in 1985 with a vision to create a welcoming space where people from all backgrounds could come together to worship God and grow in their faith.
history.growth: Over the years, our church has grown from a small gathering of families to a vibrant community that serves the greater Bethlehem area with love and compassion.
history.today: Today, we continue to be committed to our founding principles while embracing new ways to reach our community and make disciples of Jesus Christ.
